typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		date as string,
		dateint as string,
		airport as string,
		temp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true) ~> weatherjsoninput
weatherjsoninput select(mapColumn(
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectid
weatherjsoninput select(mapColumn(
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDate
Selectid sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkidcsv
SelectDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dateCsv
